original: Delborn, Carl Einar, direktörsassistent, Kalmar, f. 8/11/92 i Tranås. G. 20 m. Sigrid Nyberg. Barn: Arne f. 23. — Anst. i A-B J. Bruun i Kalm. sed. 13, s. dir :as’sist. o. chef f. bol fihkont. sed. 38. Av Smål. o. Blek. hand :kamm. godk. granskn :man. Styr:led. i Kalm. idr:nd sed. 19, Smål. idr:förb. sed. 19, Smål. fotb :förb. sed. 12, .sydöstra Sv:es spannmålshandl :-fören. sed. 43. Medl av Frimurarorden (VHI gr.). Pro Patr stGM, Riks-idr:förb. ftjt. Sv. fotb:förb. ftjM, Smål. idr:förb. ftjGM, Smål fotb:-förb. ftjt i guld, Idr:- o. SkytteGm.
translated: Delborn, Carl Einar, director's assistant, Kalmar, born on November 8th, 1892 in Tranås. Married for 20 years to Sigrid Nyberg. They have one child, Arne, born in 1923. Employed at A-B J. Bruun in Kalmar since 1913, starting as a director's assistant and becoming the head of the company's accounting department in 1938. Approved auditor of Småland and Blekinge chamber of commerce. Board member of Kalmar sports association since 1919, Småland sports federation since 1919, Småland football association since 1912, and the southeastern Sweden grain trade association since 1943. Member of Freemasonry (VHI gr.). Awarded the Pro Patria medal with a gold star, the Swedish Football Association's honorary award, the gold medal of the Småland Sports Federation, and the gold medal of the Småland Football Association. Also a member of the rifle and shooting associations.

achievements.name: Pro Patria Medal with Gold Star
